power-attack.name: Power Attack
power-attack.description: Trade attack bonus for extra damage
power-attack.notes: Take -{value} to melee attack rolls, gain +{value} to melee damage

defensive-fighting.name: Defensive Fighting
defensive-fighting.description: Gain +2 to Reflex Defense, take -2 to attacks
defensive-fighting.notes: Swift action to toggle on/off. +2 Reflex Defense, -2 to attack rolls

total-defense.name: Total Defense
total-defense.description: Gain +2 to all defenses, cannot attack
total-defense.notes: Standard action. +2 to all defenses until start of your next turn. Cannot make attacks while active.

rapid-shot.name: Rapid Shot
rapid-shot.description: Make one extra ranged attack at -2 to all attacks
rapid-shot.notes: Full-round action. Make one extra ranged attack. All attacks take -2 penalty.

double-attack.name: Double Attack
double-attack.notes: Full-round action. Make two attacks, each at -5 penalty. Requires BAB +6.

running-attack.name: Running Attack
running-attack.description: Make single attack during move action
running-attack.notes: Make a single melee or ranged attack at any point during a move action.

charging-fire.name: Charging Fire
charging-fire.description: Make ranged attack at end of charge
charging-fire.notes: Make a ranged attack at the end of a charge, taking -2 penalty on the attack roll.

cleave.name: Cleave
cleave.description: Make immediate melee attack after dropping enemy
cleave.trigger: You drop an enemy to 0 HP with a melee attack
cleave.notes: When you drop an enemy to 0 HP with a melee attack, you can immediately make one melee attack against another adjacent enemy.

combat-reflexes.name: Combat Reflexes
combat-reflexes.notes: You can make a number of attacks of opportunity per round equal to your Dexterity modifier (minimum 1).

trigger-work.name: Trigger Work (Rapid Shot)
trigger-work.description: No penalty when using Rapid Shot
trigger-work.notes: Negates the -2 penalty from Rapid Shot feat. Requires Gunslinger talent tree.

controlled-burst.name: Controlled Burst
controlled-burst.notes: Reduce autofire or burst-fire penalty by 2. If braced, no penalty. Requires Weapon Master talent tree.

multiattack-proficiency-rifles.name: Multiattack Proficiency (Rifles)
multiattack-proficiency-rifles.description: Reduce multiattack penalty by 2 for rifles
multiattack-proficiency-rifles.notes: Reduce multiattack penalty by 2 when using rifles. Requires Weapon Master talent tree.

multiattack-proficiency-pistols.name: Multiattack Proficiency (Pistols)
multiattack-proficiency-pistols.description: Reduce multiattack penalty by 2 for pistols
multiattack-proficiency-pistols.notes: Reduce multiattack penalty by 2 when using pistols. Requires Gunslinger talent tree.

multiattack-proficiency-heavy.name: Multiattack Proficiency (Heavy)
multiattack-proficiency-heavy.description: Reduce multiattack penalty by 2 for heavy weapons
multiattack-proficiency-heavy.notes: Reduce multiattack penalty by 2 when using heavy weapons. Requires Weapon Master talent tree.

dash-and-blast.name: Dash and Blast
dash-and-blast.description: Move twice your speed and attack with each pistol
dash-and-blast.notes: Once per encounter. Move twice your speed and make attacks with each pistol. Requires Pistoleer talent tree.

hailfire.name: Hailfire
hailfire.description: Attack as if autofire with two pistols
hailfire.notes: With two pistols, attack as if using autofire even without autofire, applying autofire penalties. Requires Pistoleer talent tree.

improved-suppression-fire.name: Improved Suppression Fire
improved-suppression-fire.notes: When you suppress an enemy, that enemy takes -5 attack. If targeting with autofire, each enemy in the area takes -2 attack. Requires Weapon Specialist talent tree.

draw-fire.name: Draw Fire
draw-fire.notes: Make Persuasion vs Will. Target cannot attack anyone within 6 squares if you do not have cover. Requires Commando talent tree.

cover-fire.name: Cover Fire
cover-fire.description: Grant allies +1 Defense when you attack
cover-fire.notes: When you make a ranged attack, allies within 6 squares gain +1 Defense until your next turn. Requires Commando talent tree.
